data.reason: No candidate matches the proven WON setup profile without violating risk rules: all coins either have RSI ≥ 68 or 24h gain > 15%, which falls into the AVOID zone (RSI > 75 and/or Gain > 15%). POL, BLZ, GMT, and AKT are all in chase territory with 18–20%+ daily moves, while STX is a TIER 2-style hot momentum play with Gain 8.9% and RSI 68.3, resembling the LOST SOL/FET/SNX trades more than the prior WON POL/AAVE Tier 1 setups. BTC is neutral, so no forced relative-strength exception applies. Best action per rules and recent lessons is to stay in cash and wait for a cleaner Tier 1 setup.
